TitlePage.Title: &AbelianSystems;
TitlePage.Subtitle: A &homalg; based package for systems over computable Abelian categories
TitlePage.TitleComment:
(this manual is still under construction)
This manual is best viewed as an HTML document. The latest version is available online at:
http://www-sop.inria.fr/members/Alban.Quadrat/AbelianSystems/chap0.html
An offline version should be included in the documentation subfolder of the package.
The package homepage is:
http://www-sop.inria.fr/members/Alban.Quadrat/AbelianSystems/
